mapper.update: update course set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_date = #{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_date = #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, teacher_id = #{teacherId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, name, description, start_date, end_date, teacher_id from course
mapper.update: update course set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_date = #{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_date = #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, tutor_id = #{tutorId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where course_id = #{courseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select course_id, name, description, start_date, end_date, tutor_id from course
